attributes.action: Introduce policy in which people at Speakers Corner must not wear facecoverings
attributes.background: I have noticed many antagonists using the mask of a facecovering, whether it be a balaclava or scarf when in discussions and observing. With the frequent harassment and intimidation that is happening I think it's fair to the public that everyone should be  able to be accounted for their actions.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for policies about what people do in the Royal Parks.

You can contact the Royal Parks here:

https://www.royalparks.org.uk/about-us/contact-us

If you think that people are breaking the law, you could report that to the police.
